# msc-grid



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                            | Type               | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `base`          | `base`           | The minimum width of an item of the grid               | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
| `centerContent` | `center-content` | Center container of all item-containers?               | `boolean`          | `undefined` |
| `centerItems`   | `center-items`   | Center grid items in their item-container?             | `boolean`          | `undefined` |
| `gap`           | `gap`            | The minimum width of an item of the grid               | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
| `squared`       | `center-items`   | Should every cell's height equal to it's --base width? | `boolean`          | `undefined` |
| `template`      | `template`       | Define's the grid-template                             | `string`           | `undefined` |
